predictions.article: Secretary Rollins Delivers Remarks at Commodity Classic, Announces Next Steps for Economic Disaster Relief
predictions.prediction: The distribution of $30 billion in economic and disaster relief funds will lead to a measurable increase in farmer sentiment and economic activity in rural areas within the next month.

predictions.article: US farmers face higher costs, fewer markets from tariffs, farm groups warn
predictions.prediction: The imposition of new tariffs will result in at least a 10% increase in the cost of potassium fertilizers and a 5% decrease in soybean export volumes
